# contentSize

**Instance Property**

The total size of the content contained by this container.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentSize: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is larger than [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusItemScrollableContainer/visibleSize] then the content is scrollable.

## Retrieving the content size

- **contentOffset**: The current content offset for the scrollable container.
- **visibleSize**: The visible size of the scrollable container.
